name: Tells Fox
description: Hi, I'm tells fox! I am the full owner of anything related to Fetched Fantasy! I am up to chat and hangout.

name: SylverTongue
description: Greetings! I'm Sylvertongue, your local alien space derg and co-owner of Fetched Fantasy! Come say hello if you see me around!

name: Misty Waters
description: I am the second owner of Fetched Fantasy! I am a derg and love to chat and hangout!
